meanings.sent1: My friend, aka John, is coming over for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She is a talented singer, aka a musician.
meanings.sent3: I always forget my keys, aka my forgetful habit.
meanings.sent4: The sun, aka the golden orb in the sky, was setting beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The cat, aka the fluffy feline, purred contentedly.

meanings.sent1: The criminal used an alias, aka a fake name, to hide his identity.
meanings.sent2: The spy had multiple aliases, aka different identities, for each mission.
meanings.sent3: The magician, aka the master of illusions, amazed the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The superhero, aka the caped crusader, fought against injustice in the city.
meanings.sent5: The hacker, aka the digital ghost, left no trace of their intrusion.
